Tooltip: Makes a POST request to the Assets endpoint to create a new Asset.

Arguments.Name: Folder
Arguments.Tooltip: Folder where the Asset should be created.

Arguments.Name: AssetName
Arguments.Tooltip: Name for the Asset to be created.

Arguments.Name: AssetDescription
Arguments.Tooltip: Description for the Asset to be created.

Arguments.Name: AssetValueType
Arguments.Tooltip: AssetDtoValueType of the Asset to be created.

Arguments.Name: StringValue
Arguments.Tooltip: The text value of the Asset to be created, if it is a text Asset.

Arguments.Name: BoolValue
Arguments.Tooltip: The boolean value of the Asset to be created, if it is a boolean Asset.

Arguments.Name: IntValue
Arguments.Tooltip: The integer value of the Asset to be created, if it is an integer Asset.

Arguments.Name: CredentialUsername
Arguments.Tooltip: The username value of the Asset to be created, if it is a credential Asset.

Arguments.Name: CredentialPassword
Arguments.Tooltip: The password value of the Asset to be created, if it is a credential Asset.
